data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Callmander, M. W., I. Luino, S. Da-Giau, C. Rakotovao, L. Gautier (2014): A synoptic revision of the Malagasy endemic genus Socratina Balle (Loranthaceae). Candollea 69: 65 - 73. In English, English and French abstracts. Candollea 69: 65-73, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.161132|2 occurrences
